response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our premium product to you. This exceptional item holds immense value for us, and we believe it would be equally beneficial for you. Given its significance, we propose a purchase price of $1,200,000. We are confident this offer strikes a balance between fair compensation for us and an attractive deal for you. Should you require any further information or have questions about the product, please do not hesitate to reach out. We look forward to the possibility of working together.", "product_price": 1200000}
